name: Race Master MANAGER
description:
Compete in the world championship along 24 new circuits. In only 40 MB

Based on the successful game Fx Racer and Formula Unlimited Racing but with a different gameplay.

-Option of career strategy. In this menu you can select the Motor Map and the transmission settings for each circuit.

-Selection of the type of tire that we want to mount when performing the PitStop (Super Soft, Soft, Medium, Hard, Intermediate and Extreme Rain)

-Meteorology will be changing during the race and we will have to adapt the strategy to the circumstances that arise during the race. Find the right formula and adapt to each race.

-Configuration of the suspension, brakes and settings of the gearbox.

-HUD detailed in which we will be shown the type of tire mounted and its wear, aerodynamic damage, fuel level, weather conditions, the condition of the track and the selected configuration.
